meanings.definition: The action or process of registering or being registered.
meanings.sent1: My registration for the school trip was completed online.
meanings.sent2: The registration for the event starts at 9 AM tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: During the chaotic registration process, I accidentally signed up for two classes at the same time!
meanings.sent4: Her quick registration at the marathon secured her a spot in the race.
meanings.sent5: The registration for the workshop was so simple, it felt like magic.

meanings.definition: An official list or record of names or items.
meanings.sent1: The registration of new students is done at the school office.
meanings.sent2: The registration of voters is crucial for a fair election.
meanings.sent3: The registration of all the books in the library took longer than expected.
meanings.sent4: His name was finally added to the registration after submitting the required documents.
meanings.sent5: The registration of all the participants was neatly organized in alphabetical order.
